body.p: A comment is marked in the Author mode with a background that is configured for each user name.

You can manage comments using the following actions:
Add Comment... Allows you to insert a comment at the cursor position or on a specific selection of content. The action is available in the Author toolbar.
Edit Comment... Allows you to change an existing content. The action is available both in the Author toolbar and the contextual menu.
Remove Comment(s)... Removes the comment at the cursor position or all comments found in the selected content. The action is available in the Author contextual menu,Review sub-menu.
